computer-setup.label: daint-hybrid-s1141
computer-setup.description: Piz Daint supercomputer at CSCS Lugano, Switzerland, using the hybrid partition. Project s1141
computer-setup.prepend_text:
#SBATCH --partition=normal
#SBATCH --account=s1141
#SBATCH --constraint=gpu
export OMP_NUM_THREADS=${SLURM_CPUS_PER_TASK:-1}
source $MODULESHOME/init/bash
export CRAY_CUDA_MPS=1
ulimit -s unlimited

cp2k-9.1-multicore.prepend_text:
module load daint-mc
module load CP2K

cp2k-9.1-hybrid.prepend_text:
module load daint-gpu
module load CP2K

computer-setup.label: daint-hybrid

computer-setup.prepend_text:
### computer prepend_text start ###
#SBATCH --partition=normal
#SBATCH --constraint=gpu
#SBATCH --hint=nomultithread
export OMP_NUM_THREADS=$SLURM_CPUS_PER_TASK
export CRAY_CUDA_MPS=1
ulimit -s unlimited
### computer prepend_text end ###

computer-setup.prepend_text:

#SBATCH --account=mr0
#SBATCH --constraint=mc
#SBATCH --hint=nomultithread
#SBATCH --time=00:30:00

export OMP_PROC_BIND=close
export OMP_PLACES=cores
### computer prepend_text end ###
